text: Krank may refer to: *"Krank" (song), a 2011 song by industrial rock band KMFDM *Krank Glacier, Antarctica *Krank Manufacturing Company building in St. Paul, Minnesota *Krank Park, Albany, New York *Krank, the villain of the 1995 film The City of Lost Children *Luther and Nora Krank, the main characters of the 2004 film Christmas with the Kranks, played by Tim Allen and Jamie Lee Curtis ==See also== *Crank (disambiguation)
title: Krank
